title: Kew Gardens
text: This design references the inspiration every gardener feels who visits the famous English horticultural site at Richmond. This particular colorway reminds one of the importance of seasonal effects on garden planning. The dramatic colors of spring and summer often give way to monochromatic landscapes in late fall and winter.
description: Floral/water motif.  Approx. rpt. 25\". 25\" repeat.  Jacquard tapestry.  Overall pattern realistic flowers, water, leaves. Hazelnut
